body: "A new report shows that 280,000 Colombians were displaced in 2010, and one-third of these were in areas the government claimed were "consolidated."  Colombia has a total of 5.2 million displaced people, roughly 1 out of every 9 Colombians, and the most in the world," writes Greg Weeks in Two Weeks Notice.
original_body: "A new report shows that 280,000 Colombians were displaced in 2010, and one-third of these were in areas the government claimed were "consolidated."  Colombia has a total of 5.2 million displaced people, roughly 1 out of every 9 Colombians, and the most in the world," writes Greg Weeks in Two Weeks Notice.
title: Colombia: Report Reveals 2010 Refugee Statistics
